meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: BEST USE OF SIRI YET
"'Inception' is about dreaming about dreaming about dreaming about dreaming about something or other. I fell asleep."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T1t17E&via=Digg&text=Siri's Strange Movie Reviews

div.div: MARS

div.a: Are Those Spidery Black Things On Mars Dangerous?

div.div: People first noticed these strange black... things on the Martian surface in 1998. And they're still not exactly sure what they are.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PaGazJ&via=Digg&text=Are Those Spidery Black Things On Mars Dangerous?

div.div: BAD BREATH IS PROBABLY A BIGGER CONCERN

div.a: Could Your Klout Score Keep You From Getting A Job?

div.div: It's become more common for potential employers to require applicants to log into Facebook during job interviews and states are beginning to legislate on the issue. But what about measuring a potential employee's social influence?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PPMZma&via=Digg&text=Could Your Klout Score Keep You From Getting A Job?

div.div: IT'S THE BABY, GOTTA LOVE IT
Pegomastax africanus was smaller than a housecat but not nearly as likeable -- it had 1-inch-long fangs and porcupine-style quills.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SysLRf&via=Digg&text=New Tiny, Badass Dinosaur Discovered

div.div: TOUGH MAYORSHIP TO GET
foursquare.com - via @lou_dubois
This may be the greatest check-in of all-time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFO5SA&via=Digg&text=Curiosity Checks In On Mars

div.div: ROCK 'EM SOCK 'EM ROBOTS

div.a: How To Land A Killer Punch

div.div: In a few hours, Barack Obama and Mitt Romney will face each other in their first presidential debate. The debates are widely regarded as one of the key moments in the US election campaign. How does a candidate prepare for this most crucial of duels?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PMK4uE&via=Digg&text=How To Land A Killer Punch

div.div: AS WE WISH

div.a: 'Princess Bride' Writer Admits He's Working On A Sequel

div.div: Before you start worrying that some unworthy person is going to try writing a sequel to "The Princess Bride," let it be known that the man who wrote the original, screenwriter William Goldman (who also wrote the original novel), has actually been trying to write one himself for years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QGk1oo&via=Digg&text='Princess Bride' Writer Admits He's Working On A Sequel

div.div: JUST LIKE THE REST OF THE INTERNET

div.a: Campaigns To Live Tweet The Debate

div.div: The first head-to-head match-up between President Obama and Mitt Romney on Wednesday is also the first presidential debate where both campaigns will be engaged in a virtual showdown on Twitter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RzONCm&via=Digg&text=Campaigns To Live Tweet The Debate

div.div: MESSY CARTOGRAPHY

div.a: What Europe Thought Africa Looked Like

div.div: This is how Europe poorly drew up Africa.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vc4umm&via=Digg&text=What Europe Thought Africa Looked Like

div.div: THE COST OF ISOLATION

div.a: The Disturbing Reality Of Solitary Confinement In NY Prisons

div.div: A new investigative report released by the New York Civil Liberties Union details the use of solitary confinement in New York state prisons, often with disturbing results.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O5lJmn&via=Digg&text=The Disturbing Reality Of Solitary Confinement In NY Prisons

div.div: WHAT HAPPENS IN INSURGENT CAMPS, STAYS IN INSURGENT CAMPS

div.a: Take A Tour Of Guerrilla Hideouts

div.div: Former Nepalese Maoist insurgency leader Prachanda has launched a new tourist trail and guide book, giving walkers the chance to see routes and hideouts used by the guerrillas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SCzkhc&via=Digg&text=Take A Tour Of Guerrilla Hideouts

div.div: TIPPING SEA COWS

div.a: Manhunt For Manatee-Riding Lady Comes To An End

div.div: Under Florida law molesting or annoying a manatee is a second degree misdemeanor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VvzJHG&via=Digg&text=Manhunt For Manatee-Riding Lady Comes To An End

div.div: GOOGLE TIME

div.a: Google Patents Smart Watch With Flip-Up, Transparent Display

div.div: It was not long ago that the internet was going crazy over Google's Project Glass, and now Google has our attention again with the patent of a "smart watch."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WfFzMB&via=Digg&text=Google Patents Smart Watch With Flip-Up, Transparent Display

div.div: APPLE

div.a: Want New iPhone 5 Accessories? Don't Hold Your Breath

div.div: Looking to replace your old clock radio with something that mates with your fancy new iPhone 5? You may be waiting quite some time. Apple has not yet made Lightning connecters available to developers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QFrMeg&via=Digg&text=Want New iPhone 5 Accessories? Don't Hold Your Breath

div.div: INFOGRAPHIC

div.a: Google: Voters Less Enthusiastic Than Ever

div.div: The search giant compares 2004, 2008, and 2012.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QPboLO&via=Digg&text=Google: Voters Less Enthusiastic Than Ever

div.div: BEST GIF EVER?

div.a: Who Were The 'Bitches' Who Caught Tom Brady's Ire On Sunday?

div.div: Tom Brady was involved in one of the best GIFs of Week 4 when he was caught on camera saying "Fuck you, bitches" after running for a four-yard touchdown. But no one was able to discern who the "bitches" were. Until now.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SytvWB&via=Digg&text=Who Were The 'Bitches' Who Caught Tom Brady's Ire On Sunday?

div.div: SEA SICKNESS

div.a: How The U.S. Navy Uses The Largest Hospital Ships In The World To Help Everyone

div.div: This is the USNS Comfort next to a Nimitz-class supercarrier, the biggest war ship in the world. Together with its twin, the USNS Mercy, they are the largest hospital ships on the oceans, the second largest hospital in the US and the fifth largest on the planet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QXUFmq&via=Digg&text=How The U.S. Navy Uses The Largest Hospital Ships In The World To Help Everyone

div.div: MAPTASTROPHE

div.a: Apple To Unleash Retail Army In Effort To Fix Maps App

div.div: Store managers at Apple's retail locations are said to have begun asking employees to report errors in the mapping database in iOS 6.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O55ju5&via=Digg&text=Apple To Unleash Retail Army In Effort To Fix Maps App

div.div: COULD ALSO YIELD PAINFUL DEATH

div.a: Super-Toxic Snake Venom Could Yield New Painkillers

div.div: A bite from the black mamba snake can kill an adult human within 20 minutes. But mixed in with that toxic venom is a new natural class of compound that could be used to help develop new painkillers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O5EFS1&via=Digg&text=Super-Toxic Snake Venom Could Yield New Painkillers

div.div: RAIDS

div.a: What Obama Would Have Done If Bin Laden Had Been Taken Alive

div.div: President Obama intended to put Osama bin Laden on trial in the federal court system if he had been captured, rather than killed, during the Abbottabad raid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VhsrIQ&via=Digg&text=What Obama Would Have Done If Bin Laden Had Been Taken Alive
